name: Cosmos 2 Light Outdoor/Indoor
description: Conjure up your own solar system outdoor/indoor with these globe-like lights. Acrylic diffusers in graduating sizes seem to float on slender Matte Black mountings with Satin Brass details. Available in one and two light.

name: Oslo LED ADA Sconce
description: On trend design elements fuse with classic geometric shapes to create the elegant Metro Series. A tailored White Linen shade compliments the detailed metalwork available in Satin Brass and Matte Black. The series features a warm, dimmable LED source and is ADA compliant. Like the cities that inspired them, the sconces are versatile for use in multiple settings.

name: Monaco LED ADA Sconce
description: On trend design elements fuse with classic geometric shapes to create the elegant Metro Series. A tailored White Linen shade compliments the detailed metalwork available in Satin Brass and Matte Black. The series features a warm, dimmable LED source and is ADA compliant. Like the cities that inspired them, the sconces are versatile for use in multiple settings.

name: Madrid LED ADA Sconce
description: On trend design elements fuse with classic geometric shapes to create the elegant Metro Series. A tailored White Linen shade compliments the detailed metalwork available in Satin Brass and Matte Black. The series features a warm, dimmable LED source and is ADA compliant. Like the cities that inspired them, the sconces are versatile for use in multiple settings. The Madrid sconce is American Made.

name: Cairo LED ADA Sconce
description: On trend design elements fuse with classic geometric shapes to create the elegant Metro Series. A tailored White Linen shade compliments the detailed metalwork available in Satin Brass and Matte Black. The series features a warm, dimmable LED source and is ADA compliant. name: Athens LED ADA Sconce
description: On trend design elements fuse with classic geometric shapes to create the elegant Metro Series. A tailored White Linen shade compliments the detailed metalwork available in Satin Brass and Matte Black. The series features a warm, dimmable LED source and is ADA compliant. Like the cities that inspired them, the sconces are versatile for use in multiple settings. The Athens sconce is American Made

name: Fenway Flush Mount/Sconce
description:
This five-sided integrated LED flush or sconce hits all the bases for style when placed
either singly or as a group. The 4-inch high case, with its softly shaped angles, allows for unique arrangements. Available in Satin Brass and Matte Black

name: Artemis 36"
description: Twin matte acrylic diffusers are joined by an asymmetrical metal bracket to maintain a slim profile that is equally suitable for vertical or horizontal installation. The generous width in 24-inch or 36-inch models — affords the bright illumination you want and need in the bath, while the opaque diffuser maintains a glare-free, ambient light from this integrated LED sconce.

name: Tokyo LED ADA Sconce
description: On trend design elements fuse with classic geometric shapes to create the elegant Metro Series. A tailored White Linen shade compliments the detailed metalwork available in Satin Brass and Matte Black. The series features a warm, dimmable LED source and is ADA compliant. Like the cities that inspired them, the sconces are versatile for use in multiple settings.

name: Vienna LED ADA Sconce
description: On trend design elements fuse with classic geometric shapes to create the elegant Metro Series. A tailored White Linen shade compliments the detailed metalwork available in Satin Brass and Matte Black. The series features a warm, dimmable LED source and is ADA compliant. Like the cities that inspired them, the sconces are versatile for use in multiple settings.

name: Ciro
description: Twin matte acrylic diffusers are joined by an asymmetrical metal bracket to maintain a slim profile that is equally suitable for vertical or horizontal installation. The generous width in 32-inch affords the bright illumination you want and need in the bath, while the opaque diffuser maintains a glare-free, ambient light from this integrated LED sconce.

name: Celeste
description: CELESTE Contrasting rings articulate a string of opaque white glass globes for a bejeweled effect. The matching backplate supports the integrated LED fixture even as it seems to float in midair. Available in 24 inches, with Matte Black or Chrome details.

name: Cosmos 1-Light Outdoor/Indoor
description: Conjure up your own solar system outdoors with these globe-like lights. Acrylic diffusers in graduating sizes seem to float on slender Matte Black mountings with Satin Brass details. Available in one and two light.

name: Artemis 24"
description: Twin matte acrylic diffusers are joined by an asymmetrical metal bracket to maintain a slim profile that is equally suitable for vertical or horizontal installation. The generous width in 24-inch or 36-inch models — affords the bright illumination you want and need in the bath, while the opaque diffuser maintains a glare-free, ambient light from this integrated LED sconce.

name: Prism Semi-Flush Mount
description: The drum shape summons up mid-century appeal, then adds an unexpected three-dimensional texture to the opaque white diffuser for a statement piece that’s pure delight. Available in 16 3/4-inch flush mount or semi flush mount, with Polished Nickel or Satin Brass details.

name: Prism Flush Mount
description: The drum shape summons up mid-century appeal, then adds an unexpected three-dimensional texture to the opaque white diffuser for a statement piece that’s pure delight. Available in 16 3/4-inch diameter flush mount or semi flush mount, with Polished Nickel or Satin Brass details.

name: Cadeau
description:
Multi-level accents wrap through the box-shaped, opaque diffuser, adding the effect
of fanciful movement to this simple LED-integrated flush mount.

name: Bend LED ADA Sconce
description: Striking in its minimalism, this LED-integrated sconce offers exceptional design capabilities, particularly for personalization or branding. The brass panel can be customized with letters, numbers, even a logo, making it especially effective in a hospitality setting. Solid Brass

name: Double-L LED Sconce
description: Two slender arms project from a single backplate for a proﬁle that’s pleasing in its barely-there symmetry. Requiring minimal space, this thoughtful design is well-suited for placement over a sink or installed on the sides of a mirror.

name: Ava LED ADA Linear Sconce, Lena
Ava LED ADA Linear Sconce, Lena
Ava LED ADA Linear Sconce, Lena
P2159, DP2159
description: Cylinder pendant with acrylic diffuser and solid brass details.

name: P2160, DP2160
description: Bowl pendant with pure virgin acrylic diffuser and solid brass details.

name: P3160, DP3160
description: Bowl pendant with pure virgin acrylic diffuser and solid brass details throughout.

name: C3160, DC3160
description: Ceiling Mount or Semi-flush mount with acrylic diffuser and solid brass details.

name: S3160, DS3160
description: ADA Sconce with pure virgin acrylic diffuser and solid brass hardware throughout.

name: Columbus Circle Double Sconce
description: Circular design detail allows for two finishes to tastefully complement the Columbus Circle Double Sconce’s Cream Linen shade to establish a classic aesthetic in transitional spaces. This elegant design is a part of the City Series.

name: Madison Ave Double Sconce
description: Commercial spaces come to life with the sleek, modern aesthetic of the Madison Avenue Sconce. American-made beautiful and unique, this lighting fixture is a part of the dynamic City Series.

name: Soho Double Sconce with Top Detail
Union Single Sconce
description: The block shelf design detail allows for two finishes to tastefully complement the Union City Series sconce’s cream linen shade to establish a classic aesthetic in transitional spaces. This elegant design is a part of the City Series.

name: Union Double Sconce
description: The block shelf design detail allows for two finishes to tastefully complement the Union City Series sconce’s cream linen shade to establish a classic aesthetic in transitional spaces. This elegant design is a part of the City Series.

name: Triple Play Flush Mount
description:
With its three graceful globes, this semi-flush fixture casts a wider scope of ambient light than a typical ceiling fixture. Contrasting metal caps lend sophisticated sparkle
where they join the opaque glass shades to the slim stems connecting to the canopy. Available in Matte Black with Polished Nickel or Polished Brass details.

name: Prism Semi-Flush Mount
description: The drum shape summons up mid-century appeal, then adds an unexpected three-dimensional texture to the opaque white diffuser for a statement piece that’s pure delight. Available in 16 3/4-inch flush mount or semi flush mount, with Polished Nickel or Satin Brass details.

name: Prism Flush Mount
description: The drum shape summons up mid-century appeal, then adds an unexpected three-dimensional texture to the opaque white diffuser for a statement piece that’s pure delight. Available in 16 3/4-inch diameter flush mount or semi flush mount, with Polished Nickel or Satin Brass details.

name: Fenway Flush Mount/Sconce
description:
This five-sided integrated LED flush or sconce hits all the bases for style when placed
either singly or as a group. The 4-inch high case, with its softly shaped angles, allows for unique arrangements. Available in Satin Brass and Matte Black

name: Cere Flush Mount
description:
Robust in its scale yet refined with its materials, Cere imagines the farmhouse trend in lighting. Use it in traditional, transitional or contemporary settings, indoors and out, calling for a statement piece that
is both adaptable and functional.

name: Cadeau
description:
Multi-level accents wrap through the box-shaped, opaque diffuser, adding the effect
of fanciful movement to this simple LED-integrated flush mount.

name: Cubist Flush Mount
description: The geometric shape of this flush-mount fixture is pure fun while the clean white light emitted from the matte acrylic diffuser is pure pleasure. A magnetic mount makes it easy to shift the fixture at whim once the socket is installed. Matte black metal defines the lines of the box. Group several together for a fanciful focal point.

name: Libro Glass Ceiling
description: Laura Kirar’s glass ceiling version of the Libro utilizes custom Italian glass, defined by its delicately crafted creases. The glass is a stunning Amber Gold Fleck. The Libro Glass Ceiling is part of the creatively designed Portfolio Collection, which also includes a one, two and three light pendant, and an ADA sconce choice.

name: C3160, DC3160
description: Ceiling Mount or Semi-flush mount with acrylic diffuser and solid brass details.

name: C2160, DC2160
description: Ceiling Mount or Semi-flush mount with acrylic diffuser and solid brass details.

name: Flame Star Chandelier
description: Incorporating our iconic Flame uplight/downlight combo, this chandelier takes a graceful new turn with its six-pointed, assymetrical star-shaped arm. A six-cord suspension with a powerful single aircraft cable supports the 36-inch diameter fixture and its unique, fluid form, so that you can confidently install it anywhere you want to make a stellar statement. Available in Matte Black with Chrome details.

name: Column Pendant Cluster
description: The Column Pendants are offered in custom cluster arrangments using the slender, single-drop pendant with a glass-over-metal design. Three glass styles and two finishes offer versatility and style, especially when installed in clusters of three or more. Adjustable-length cord allows for mounting at different heights. Standard 3-Light with rectangular canopy and 5-Light  with circular canopy clusters are available.

name: Ghost Rectangle Chandelier
description: ILEX’s signature Ghost takes on a new rectangular shape for additional versatility. A shimmering organza shade in gold, silver or black elegantly exposes the metal frame and lamps. With sixteen 40 Watt candelabra lamps the Rectangle Ghost provides ample illumination. The American - made Ghost is available in five finishes and offers a choice of accent candle tapers in black or copper. Custom sizes and finishes are available.

name: Ghost 36" Chandelier with Glass
description: This smaller diameter version of the Ghost Chandelier pulled together with a sophisticated Organza band shade with chic finish choices is also offered with glass diffusers over each of the candelabras. Beautifully crafted – American made – Ghost Chandelier Series includes multiple choices in size, finish and Organza Shade options and,1 and 2 light ADA sconces.

name: Ghost 48" Chandelier
description: The 48, 60 and 72 inch diameter Ghost Chandelier have twelve candelabra lamps pulled together with a sophisticated Organza band shade, complemented with chic finishes to create a unique chandelier. Also available with glass diffusers over each candelabra (shown above). Beautifully crafted – American made – Ghost Chandelier Series includes choices in size, finish and Organza shade options and 1 and 2 light ADA sconces.

name: Ghost 60" Chandelier
description: The 48, 60 and 72 inch diameter Ghost Chandelier have twelve candelabra lamps pulled together with a sophisticated Organza band shade, complemented with chic finishes to create a unique chandelier. Also available with glass diffusers over each candelabra (shown above). Beautifully crafted – American made – Ghost Chandelier Series includes choices in size, finish and Organza shade options and 1 and 2 light ADA sconces.

name: Ghost 72" Chandelier
description: The 48, 60 and 72 inch diameter Ghost Chandelier have twelve candelabra lamps pulled together with a sophisticated Organza band shade, complemented with chic finishes to create a unique chandelier. Also available with glass diffusers over each candelabra (shown above). Beautifully crafted – American made – Ghost Chandelier Series includes choices in size, finish and Organza shade options and 1 and 2 light ADA sconces.

name: Ghost 24" Chandelier with Glass
description: This smaller diameter version of the Ghost Chandelier pulled together with a sophisticated Organza band shade with chic finish choices is also offered with glass diffusers over each of the candelabras. Beautifully crafted – American made – Ghost Chandelier Series includes multiple choices in size, finish and Organza Shade options and,1 and 2 light ADA sconces.

name: P2159, DP2159
description: Cylinder pendant with acrylic diffuser and solid brass details.

name: P3160, DP3160
description: Bowl pendant with pure virgin acrylic diffuser and solid brass details throughout.

name: P2160, DP2160
description: Bowl pendant with pure virgin acrylic diffuser and solid brass details.

name: Column Pendant Smokey Glass
description: The Smokey Glass Column Pendant is a slender, single-drop pendant with a contemporary feel with its glass-over-metal design. Three glass styles and two finishes offer versatility and style, especially when installed in clusters of three or more. Adjustable-length cord allows for mounting at different heights.

name: Balance Pendant
description: Truly a high-wire act, this graceful fixture, with its acrobat-like bulbs, will turn all eyes upward even as it transforms a room bathed in its soft light. Choose your color for the cord, for greater customization.

name: Column Pendant 3 Light Cluster
description: The 3-Light Column Pendant combines any three of the glass-over-metal single-drop pendants hung from a rectangular canopy. Three glass styles and two finishes offer versatility and style, especially when installed at diffferent heights or with a mix of glass styles. Adjustable-length cord allows for mounting at different heights. Column Pendants also available in a 5-Light round canopy cluster and custom clusters.

name: Column Pendant Clear Glass
description: The Clear Glass Column Pendant is a slender, single-drop pendant with a contemporary feel with its glass-over-metal design. Three glass styles and two finishes offer versatility and style, especially when installed in clusters of three or more. Adjustable-length cord allows for mounting at different heights.

name: Column Pendant Amber Glass
description: The Amber Glass Column Pendant is a slender, single-drop pendant with a contemporary feel with its glass-over-metal design. Three glass styles and two finishes offer versatility and style, especially when installed in clusters of three or more. Adjustable-length cord allows for mounting at different heights.

name: Libro 1 Glass Pendant
description: Laura Kirar’s single-glass version of the Libro utilizes custom Italian glass, defined by its delicately crafted creases. The glass is  a stunning Amber Gold Fleck. The Libro single glass pendant is a part of the creatively designed Portfolio Collection, which also includes two additional pendants, a ceiling and ADA sconce choice.

name: Libro 3 Glass Pendant
description: Laura Kirar’s multi-glass version of the Libro utilizes custom Italian glass, defined by its delicately crafted creases. The glass is a stunning Amber Gold Fleck. The Libro 3 Pendant is a part of the creatively designed Portfolio Collection, which also includes two additional pendants, a ceiling and ADA sconce choice.

name: Cere Narrow Pendant
description:
Suspend a trio of pendants your choice of large or small over a kitchen island or workspace for focused illumination.
This version in the Cere comes without the lip, to emphasize the slender vertical of its profile.

name: Woods Large Glass Pendant
description:
The fixture features a stylized aesthetic complete with etched glass that
recalls the dramatic spread of the forest. An abstract take on nature’s forms,
the pendant provides a rustic glow.

name: Back Bay Small Wall Outdoor, American Made
description: A modern twist on a colonial style rectangle lantern the Back Back is available in two size wall sconces and post light. Available in Aged Brass (AG) and Matte Black (MB). The Aged Brass finish is a “Living Finishes” in keeping with the hand-rubbed appearance, overtime the finish will weather to a beautiful patina. The Back Bay is American Made, and comes with a Lifetime Guarantee.

name: Cone Large Wall Outdoor
description: This voluptuous bell-shaped fixture reinvents an iconic shape with its interplay of solid brass details, clear glass diffuser and exposed lamp, to transform contemporary outdoor applications. Available in Matte Black and Satin Brass.

name: Cone Small Wall Outdoor
description: This voluptuous bell-shaped fixture reinvents an iconic shape with its interplay of solid brass details, clear glass diffuser and exposed lamp, to transform contemporary outdoor applications. Available in Matte Black and Satin Brass.

name: Waterfall Small Wall Outdoor
description:
Clear molded glass is made even more luminous by a matte black frame.
The result: understated glamour that’s appropriate for transitional or traditional
outdoor settings. Install the sconces at either side of an entrance and add
matching post to illuminate a walkway for a uniquely memorable effect.

name: Fenway Flush Mount/Sconce
description:
This five-sided integrated LED flush or sconce hits all the bases for style when placed
either singly or as a group. The 4-inch high case, with its softly shaped angles, allows for unique arrangements. Available in Satin Brass and Matte Black

name: Fleur 1 Light Sconce
description: Introduce the artisanal to the bath with this sensuously sculpted fixture. Uplighting softly illuminates the room. One- two- and three-light styles let you place the amount of light where you need it, for morning tasks and evening relaxation. A staggered matte black chrome backplate emphasizes the beauty of the frosted-white glass shades.

name: Fleur 2 Light Sconce
description: Introduce the artisanal to the bath with this sensuously sculpted fixture. Uplighting softly illuminates the room. One- two- and three-light styles let you place the amount of light where you need it, for morning tasks and evening relaxation. A staggered Matte Black or Chrome backplate emphasizes the beauty of the frosted-white glass shades.

name: Fleur 3 Light Sconce
description: Introduce the artisanal to the bath with this sensuously sculpted fixture. Uplighting softly illuminates the room. One- two- and three-light styles let you place the amount of light where you need it, for morning tasks and evening relaxation. A staggered Matte Black or Chrome backplate emphasizes the beauty of the frosted-white glass shades.

name: Celeste
description: CELESTE Contrasting rings articulate a string of opaque white glass globes for a bejeweled effect. The matching backplate supports the integrated LED fixture even as it seems to float in midair. Available in 24 inches, with Matte Black or Chrome details.

name: Union Double Sconce
description: The block shelf design detail allows for two finishes to tastefully complement the Union City Series sconce’s cream linen shade to establish a classic aesthetic in transitional spaces. This elegant design is a part of the City Series.

name: Audrey Swing Arm
description: Inspired by the popular Carnival fixture, this adjustable swing-arm wall mount, with its voluptuous shade, fits easily into any interior. Product can be hard-wired or plugged in with a cord; the discreet on/off switch on the backplate lets the strong lines of the fixture take pride of place. Available in Aged Brass with Gold Chrome Glass Shade or Matte Black with Black to Clear Glass Shade.

name: Oak Park Outdoor/Indoor Wall
description: Ultra-minimal in design, Oak Park offers great versatility for installation. Suitable both indoors and outdoors, this ambient lighting fixture can be hung left or right. A rectilinear Matte Black steel plate, 25 inches in length, bisects the 7 ½-inch acrylic diffuser and extends slightly beyond the shorter plate behind it for maximum architectural effect while occupying very little space.

name: Cosmos 2 Light Outdoor/Indoor
description: Conjure up your own solar system outdoor/indoor with these globe-like lights. Acrylic diffusers in graduating sizes seem to float on slender Matte Black mountings with Satin Brass details. Available in one and two light.

name: Artemis 36"
description: Twin matte acrylic diffusers are joined by an asymmetrical metal bracket to maintain a slim profile that is equally suitable for vertical or horizontal installation. The generous width in 24-inch or 36-inch models — affords the bright illumination you want and need in the bath, while the opaque diffuser maintains a glare-free, ambient light from this integrated LED sconce.

name: Artemis 24"
description: Twin matte acrylic diffusers are joined by an asymmetrical metal bracket to maintain a slim profile that is equally suitable for vertical or horizontal installation. The generous width in 24-inch or 36-inch models — affords the bright illumination you want and need in the bath, while the opaque diffuser maintains a glare-free, ambient light from this integrated LED sconce.

name: Murano Sconce
description: A column of molded glass rings encircles this uplight and downlight to achieve a singularly bold yet ethereal effect. The backplate and bracket mimic the stacked treatment. This dazzling fixture would enhance a variety of spaces, from a foyer or dining room to a master bath or powder room. Available in Chrome, Matte Black or Satin Brass

name: Flame Sconce
description: Gradient shading within the diffuser accentuates the curves and wave detail in the backplate. The Flame has chrome blended into the glass, achieving an almost liquid luminosity. This uplight/downlight combination is romantic yet restrained, making it perfect for public or private spaces, like a dining room or bathroom.

name: Cosmos 1-Light Outdoor/Indoor
description: Conjure up your own solar system outdoors with these globe-like lights. Acrylic diffusers in graduating sizes seem to float on slender Matte Black mountings with Satin Brass details. Available in one and two light.

name: Icycle 1 Light Sconce
description: This sconce offers astonishing versatility within its many distinctive elements. The gradation within the diffuser is realized with chrome incorporated into the glass. Choose one lamp or opt for two—an uplight and a downlight—or combine the single sconces with the horizontal double sconce in a bath for truly suite results. The scored backplate echoes the detail on both base and diffuser.

name: Bend LED ADA Sconce
description: Striking in its minimalism, this LED-integrated sconce offers exceptional design capabilities, particularly for personalization or branding. The brass panel can be customized with letters, numbers, even a logo, making it especially effective in a hospitality setting. Solid Brass

name: Icycle 2 Light Sconce
description: This sconce offers astonishing versatility within its many distinctive elements. The gradation within the diffuser is realized with chrome incorporated into the glass. Choose one lamp or opt for two—an uplight and a downlight—or combine the single sconces with the horizontal double sconce in a bath for truly suite results. The scored backplate echoes the detail on both base and diffuser.

name: Madrid LED ADA Sconce
description: On trend design elements fuse with classic geometric shapes to create the elegant Metro Series. A tailored White Linen shade compliments the detailed metalwork available in Satin Brass and Matte Black. The series features a warm, dimmable LED source and is ADA compliant. Like the cities that inspired them, the sconces are versatile for use in multiple settings. The Madrid sconce is American Made.

name: Double-L LED Sconce
description: Two slender arms project from a single backplate for a proﬁle that’s pleasing in its barely-there symmetry. Requiring minimal space, this thoughtful design is well-suited for placement over a sink or installed on the sides of a mirror.

name: Ava LED ADA Linear Sconce, Lena
Ava LED ADA Linear Sconce, Lena
Ava LED ADA Linear Sconce, Lena
Libro Glass Sconce
description: Laura Kirar’s ADA glass sconce utilizes subtle undulation, resembling the surface of an open book. Movement and fluidity in design are continued with gold flecks, which are immersed in the sconce’s glass diffuser. The glass is a stunning Amber Gold Fleck. The Libro sconce is part of the creatively designed Portfolio Collection, which also includes three pendants and a ceiling choice.

name: Columbus Circle Double Sconce
description: Circular design detail allows for two finishes to tastefully complement the Columbus Circle Double Sconce’s Cream Linen shade to establish a classic aesthetic in transitional spaces. This elegant design is a part of the City Series.

name: Madison Ave Double Sconce
description: Commercial spaces come to life with the sleek, modern aesthetic of the Madison Avenue Sconce. American-made beautiful and unique, this lighting fixture is a part of the dynamic City Series.

name: Soho Double Sconce with Top Detail
Union Single Sconce
description: The block shelf design detail allows for two finishes to tastefully complement the Union City Series sconce’s cream linen shade to establish a classic aesthetic in transitional spaces. This elegant design is a part of the City Series.

name: Stick 4 Light Sconce
description:
Slim Medium Based Edison lamps radiate on fixed stems from a matching Matte Black backplate.
The 4-light option offers up and down lights for a wall application; the quartet, with
decorative filament lamps makes for a playful horizontal treatment over a vanity. The Stick is also available in a 3 Light version.

name: Hollywood Bath Bar
description: An updated twist on the old style Hollywood strip light. The “NEW” Hollywood Bath Bar is the right choice for added illumination for bathrooms and dressing areas. The (9) Medium Based Edison incandescent or LED replacement lamps can be mixed and matched to add visual interest. Also well suited for mounting on ceilings.

name: S3160, DS3160
description: ADA Sconce with pure virgin acrylic diffuser and solid brass hardware throughout.
